data.author: Chase Peeler

changelog.release_notes: Unsubscribe users from topics no longer supported by the app (since it's possible there are still timeline pins linked to those topics)

- Got rid of top level options, having the various groups didn't really make sense - so now you only have the game formats to choose from
- Fixed issues with the missing icons
- Cleaned up all icons - sized to 28x28 so they don't overlap text at times
- Added options for Muggins and Manual Count
- Pins now have a different icon
- Pins now generate a reminder 30 minutes before a tournament
- If a pin is added for a tournament less than 24 hours in the future, a notification will be fired

I still need to manage the removal of cancelled tournaments and update notifications.
Hopefully fixed the icon issue, as well as updated the asset package.

data.description:
Timeline Pins for eCribbage.com* tournaments. You can subscribe to pins for different kinds of tournaments: Traditional, Variations, Kings, etc.

You'll get a reminder 30 minutes before a tournament starts, and you'll also get a notification of any tournaments added with less than 24 hours notice.

This is the first non-watch face that I've created, so all feedback is welcome.

Features planned for 3.0:
- Update notifications if something changes
- Proper removal of cancelled tournaments
- Ability to indicate you've signed up for a tournament so you can receive a notification right before it starts.

* If you aren't a member, eCribbage.com is free to join. When prompted, tell them chasepeeler referred you!
data.title: eCribbage Tournaments
